page.title: 06PINEWOOD STUDIOS.
page.content:
As the days of talkie movies dawned,a MR Charles Boot joined with two other men and bought a large Victorian estate,and large gardens,which they turned into film studios called PINEWOOD.Boot later employed J.Arthur Rank,who began the Rank Organisation. PINEWOOD has a sixteenth century door and at least 100 tree lined acres for filming,sixteen stages and twenty-five departments for film making,from lighting to dubbing,and producing. PINEWOOD also has a bar for the workers and a sophisticated one for the stars.Bond films have been privileged to have a studio built especially for them to be filmed in. Carry-on films were made at PINEWOOD and Superman films.
Susannah Mould aged 11.
